text: Thanga Thamaraigal () is a 1991 Tamil language drama film, directed by V. Azhagappan and produced by Gangai Film Circuit. The film features Arjun and Rupini in the lead roles. The film had a musical score by Ilaiyaraaja and was released on 23 March 1990.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RsII98uwuT0http://www.in.com/tv/movies/raj- digital-plus-161/thanga-thamaraigal-50956.html The film was later dubbed in Telugu as Gang Fighter.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zZcC1ahSmmE ==Cast== *Arjun as Ram *Rupini *Kalpana *Janagaraj *Livingston as Satish *Swaminathan as Moorthy ==Soundtrack== The film score and the soundtrack were composed by film composer Ilaiyaraaja. The soundtrack, released in 1991, features 6 tracks. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! Track !! Song !! Singer(s)!!
